name: REQUIRED_DOC_RESP_USERS
description: This table contains information about the users responsible for required documentation tasks.

columns.name: TASK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the task record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REQ_DOC_RESP_USER_ID
columns.description: Users considered responsible for required documentation tasks.

columns.name: REQ_DOC_RESP_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
